query.name: pkList
query.sql: select cn.table_name name, cn.constraint_name pk_constraint, col.column_name pk_column from user_constraints cn join user_cons_columns col on col.constraint_name = cn.constraint_name where cn.constraint_type = 'P' and cn.table_name in (:tables)

query.name: fkList
query.sql: select src.table_name, src.constraint_name cons_name, src_col.column_name from user_constraints src join user_constraints dest on dest.constraint_name = src.r_constraint_name join user_cons_columns src_col on src_col.constraint_name = src.constraint_name where src.constraint_type = 'R' and dest.constraint_type = 'P' and dest.table_name = :table

query.name: addPkCons
query.sql: alter table :table add constraint :cons primary key (:col)

query.name: addFkCons
query.sql: alter table :table add constraint :cons foreign key (:col) references :dest_table
